intro.toptitle: FUNDAMENTALS IN THE MINDSET OF RAAC
intro.title: Quality, reliability and creativity
intro.subtitle: The organization RAAC was launched end 2012. The first weeks the focus was executing AS9100 and ISO9001 audit for the certification body Lloyds register on a freelance basis.
intro.text: After several weeks, the request for consultancy was increasing, therefore we also launched consultancy. At the moment, there is a good mix between consultancy and auditing.

1.title: RAAC CAN ASSIST YOU IF YOU WANT A CERTIFIED MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

2.title: YOU WANT A CERTIFIED MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

1.label: Read more
1.text: Establish / maintain a quality management system according to ISO9001, ISO14001 and 18001
1.title: QUALITY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

2.label: Read more
2.text: Aviation quality management systems according AS9100/9110/9120 EASA Part-21, Part-145
2.title: AVIATION QUALITY MANAGEMENT SYSTEMS

3.label: Read more
3.text: Nadcap production processes according to the PRI checklists NDT, WLD, HT, and EDM
3.title: NADCAP PRODUCTION
